original: @115a * // bla ma'i mandal bzhugs//
analyzed: @115a * // bla ma'i mandal bzhugs//
translated: The Mandala of the Guru

original: # // 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjuvajra.

original: rdor sems bdag nyid bla ma mgon //
analyzed: rdor sems bdag nyid bla ma mgon //
translated: The guru, the protector, is the essence of Vajrasattva.

original: gus pas phyag byas de nas ni //🔽man ngag ji bzhin mdor bsdus pas //
analyzed: gus pas phyag byas de nas ni // man ngag ji bzhin mdor bsdus pas //
translated: Having respectfully prostrated to him,🔽I will explain his mandala ritual

original: de yi mandal cho ga bshad //🔽byis pa blo zhan yid gzhungs rnams //
analyzed: de yi mandal cho ga bshad // byis pa blo zhan yid gzhungs rnams //
translated: in brief, according to the instructions.🔽For the sake of increasing the merit and wisdom

original: bsod nams ye shes rnam 'phel phyir //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes rnam 'phel phyir //
translated: of the childish, the weak-minded, and the intelligent,🔽I will analyze the meaning of the mandala

original: 'gro la phan yon dang bcas pa'i //🔽mandal don ni rnam dbye bya //
analyzed: 'gro la phan yon dang bcas pa'i // mandal don ni rnam dbye bya //
translated: that is beneficial for beings.

original: dang por / aom a'a: h'um badzra bh'u mi h'um /🔽zhes pas sa byin gyis brlabs te //🔽aom badzro da ke h'um /
analyzed: dang por / aom a'a: h'um badzra bh'u mi h'um / zhes pas sa byin gyis brlabs te // aom badzro da ke h'um /
translated: First, with Om Ah Hum Vajra Bhuvi Hum, consecrate the ground.

original: ba byung dang bcas pa'i chu byin gyis brlabs so //🔽aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'um /
analyzed: ba byung dang bcas pa'i chu byin gyis brlabs so // aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'um /
translated: With Om Vajra Udaka Hum, consecrate the water with cow dung.

original: zhes pas me tog byin gyis brlabs la //🔽aom a'a: badzra re khe h'um /
analyzed: zhes pas me tog byin gyis brlabs la // aom a'a: badzra re khe h'um /
translated: With Om Ah Hum Vajra Pushpe Hum, consecrate the flowers.

original: zhes pas mandal byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: zhes pas mandal byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: With Om Ah Hum Vajra Rekha Hum, consecrate the mandala.

original: aom ham su ma h'a me ra we na ma:/
analyzed: aom ham su ma h'a me ra we na ma:/
translated: With Om Ham Sum Maha Meru Na Ma,

original: zhes pas mandal gyi dbus su me tog gzhag go //
analyzed: zhes pas mandal gyi dbus su me tog gzhag go //
translated: With this, place a flower in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: aom yam b'urba bi de h'a yan ma:/
analyzed: aom yam b'urba bi de h'a yan ma:/
translated: Oṃ yaṃ vaurvaidehānaṃ

original: zhes pas shar du'o //
analyzed: zhes pas shar du'o //
translated: With this, place a flower in the east.

original: aom ram dambu dv'i @115b p'a ya na ma:/
analyzed: aom ram dambu dv'i @115b p'a ya na ma:/
translated: Oṃ raṃ jambudvīpāya naṃ

original: zhes pas lho ru'o //
analyzed: zhes pas lho ru'o //
translated: With this, place a flower in the south.

original: aom lam aa ba ra go da n'i ye na ma:/
analyzed: aom lam aa ba ra go da n'i ye na ma:/
translated: Oṃ laṃ avaragodānīye naṃ

original: zhes pas nub tu'o //
analyzed: zhes pas nub tu'o //
translated: With this, place a flower in the west.

original: aom wam autta ra ku ra we na ma:/
analyzed: aom wam autta ra ku ra we na ma:/
translated: Oṃ vaṃ uttarakuruṇāṃ naṃ

original: zhes pas byang du'o //
analyzed: zhes pas byang du'o //
translated: With this, place a flower in the north.

original: de nas rang rang gi g-yas g-yon gyi glo dag tu //🔽aom ya: au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
analyzed: de nas rang rang gi g-yas g-yon gyi glo dag tu // aom ya: au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
translated: Then, in the right and left flanks,🔽Oṃ yaḥ upadvīpāya naṃ

original: aom ra: au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/🔽aom wa au pa dv'i b'a ya na ma:/
analyzed: aom ra: au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/ aom wa au pa dv'i b'a ya na ma:/
translated: Oṃ raḥ upadvīpāya naṃ🔽Oṃ vaḥ upadvīpāya naṃ

original: aom la au pa dv'i b'a ya na ma:/
analyzed: aom la au pa dv'i b'a ya na ma:/
translated: Oṃ laḥ upadvīpāya naṃ

original: zhes pas me tog dgod do //
analyzed: zhes pas me tog dgod do //
translated: Place flowers with this.

original: de'i rjes su aom ya ga dza ratn'a yan ma:/
analyzed: de'i rjes su aom ya ga dza ratn'a yan ma:/
translated: After that, Oṃ yaḥ gaja ratnāya naṃ

original: aom ra bu ru sha ratn'a yan ma:/🔽aom wa b'a dzi ratn'a yan ma:/
analyzed: aom ra bu ru sha ratn'a yan ma:/ aom wa b'a dzi ratn'a yan ma:/
translated: Oṃ raḥ bhūruha ratnāya naṃ🔽Oṃ vaḥ vāji ratnāya naṃ

original: aom la str'i ratn'a yan ma: //
analyzed: aom la str'i ratn'a yan ma: //
translated: Oṃ laḥ satrī ratnāya naṃ

original: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su me tog gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su me tog gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Place flowers in the east and so forth.

original: de nas y'a: khadga ratn'a yan ma:/🔽aom r'a: tsakra ratn'a yan ma: //
analyzed: de nas y'a: khadga ratn'a yan ma:/ aom r'a: tsakra ratn'a yan ma: //
translated: Then, in the directions beginning with the southeast,🔽with the mantras:🔽OM RAḤ cakraratnāya namaḥ,

original: aom l'a: ma ni ratn'a yan ma: //
analyzed: aom l'a: ma ni ratn'a yan ma: //
translated: OM LAḤ maṇiratnāya namaḥ,

original: aom w'a: sarba ni bhi bhyo na ma:/🔽zhes pas me la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o //
analyzed: aom w'a: sarba ni bhi bhyo na ma:/ zhes pas me la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o //
translated: OM VAḤ sarvanibhibhyonamaḥ.🔽After that, between Meru and Yugandhara, with the mantra:

original: de'i rjes su ri rab dang gleng po'i bar du aom s'u ry'a ya na ma:/
analyzed: de'i rjes su ri rab dang gleng po'i bar du aom s'u ry'a ya na ma:/
translated: OM SŪRYĀYA NAMAḤ,🔽and likewise, between Meru and Khadiraka, with the mantra:

original: de bzhin du ri rab dang rta'i bar du aom tsandra ya na ma:/
analyzed: de bzhin du ri rab dang rta'i bar du aom tsandra ya na ma:/
translated: OM CANDRA NAMAḤ,

original: zhes me tog dgod //
analyzed: zhes me tog dgod //
translated: scatter flowers.🔽With the mantra:

original: aom ha: aa dha rme na ma:/
analyzed: aom ha: aa dha rme na ma:/
translated: OM HAṂ adharme namaḥ,

original: zhes byang chub kyi gnas su me tog dgod do //
analyzed: zhes byang chub kyi gnas su me tog dgod do //
translated: scatter flowers in the place of enlightenment.

original: de ltar rin po che bdun la sogs pa dang ldan zhing ri rab la sogs pas brgyan pa'i mandal yid kyis nges par bzung nas bla ma la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rin po che bdun la sogs pa dang ldan zhing ri rab la sogs pas brgyan pa'i mandal yid kyis nges par bzung nas bla ma la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus mentally visualized the mandala endowed with the seven jewels and adorned with Meru and so forth, one should offer it to the guru.

original: bsod nams de sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsod nams de sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: That merit should be dedicated for the attainment of the unsurpassed state by all sentient beings.

original: ao a'a: mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i mandal gyi cho ga'o//
analyzed: ao a'a: mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i mandal gyi cho ga'o//
translated: This is the procedure of the guru maṇḍala.
